casebody.data:
Seymour E. ALLEN, Plaintiff, Appellant, v. PROBATE COURT OF HAMPDEN COUNTY, SPRINGFIELD, MASSACHUSETTS, Defendant, Appellee. No. 4404. United States Court of Appeals First Circuit. May 9, 1949. Seymour E. Allen, of Springfield, Mass., pro se. Edward P. Healy, Asst. Atty. Gen., of Massachusetts (Francis E. Kelly, Atty. Gen., of Massachusetts, on the brief), for appellee.

*127Before MAGRUDER, Chief Judge, WOODBURY, Circuit Judge, and LIND-LEY, District Judge.

PER CURIAM.

The order of the District Court is affirmed.
